Our Drawings

Small footprint power stations

Most of our sites will replace existing anaerobic/ bio digester and incinerators and later large coal-fired power stations due to the efficient extraction of energy from bio products and waste. Through our research we are developing further advances in fuel emulsion that reduces liquid fuel by 40% and exhaust heat capture that can produce further electrical output, cold airflow, steam for cleaning, and carbon black activation producing useful, profitable products from the resulting concentrate ash.

The following drawings show a range of small footprint power stations from 2 megawatt to 6.8 megawatt with no more than 4 ton per hour selected waste as input fuel.

  • 2MW SITE L175-009-A
  • 4MW SITE L175-010-A
  • 4MW SITE WITH 40% LIQUID FUEL REDUCTION L175-011-A
  • 6MW SITE WITH CHP POWER L175-012-A
  • GENERATOR SPEC 5.5 OUTPUT WARTSILA CR26GD
